provided_configuration:
receivers:
  prometheus:
    config:
      scrape_configs:
        - job_name: "otelcol"
          scrape_interval: 10s
          static_configs:
            - targets: ["0.0.0.0:8888"]
          metric_relabel_configs:
            - source_labels: [__name__]
              regex: ".*grpc_io.*"
              action: drop
  otlp:
    protocols:
      grpc:
      http:
exporters:
  datadog:
    api:
      key: $DD_API_KEY
service:
  pipelines:
    traces:
      receivers: [otlp]
      exporters: [datadog]
    metrics:
      receivers: [otlp, prometheus]
      exporters: [datadog]
    logs:
      receivers: [otlp]
      exporters: [datadog]
runtime_override_configuration:
processors:
  tagenrich:
  batch:
    timeout: 10s
connectors:
  datadog/connector:
	compute_stats_by_span_kind: true
	peer_tags_aggregation: true
service:
  pipelines:
    traces:
      processors: [batch,tagenrich]
      exporters: [datadog/connector,datadog]
    metrics:
      receivers: [otlp,prometheus,datadog/connector]
      processors: [batch,tagenrich]
    logs:
      processors: [batch,tagenrich]
full_configuration:
receivers:
  prometheus:
    config:
      scrape_configs:
        - job_name: "otelcol"
          scrape_interval: 10s
          static_configs:
            - targets: ["0.0.0.0:8888"]
          metric_relabel_configs:
            - source_labels: [__name__]
              regex: ".*grpc_io.*"
              action: drop
  otlp:
    protocols:
      grpc:
      http:
exporters:
  datadog:
    api:
      key: $DD_API_KEY
processors:
  tagenrich:
  batch:
    timeout: 10s
connectors:
  datadog/connector:
	compute_stats_by_span_kind: true
	peer_tags_aggregation: true
service:
  pipelines:
    traces:
      receivers: [otlp]
      processors: [batch,tagenrich]
      exporters: [datadog/connector,datadog]
    metrics:
      receivers: [otlp, prometheus,datadog/connector]
      processors: [batch,tagenrich]
      exporters: [datadog]
    logs:
      receivers: [otlp]
      processors: [batch,tagenrich]
      exporters: [datadog]
